extendedInfo.description: Create your own event and share photos through Twitter with all your friends in real-timewhenever, where ever, whatever you're doing. Even with remote buddies, allow everyone in your group to view and add comments. Everyone uploads, everyone wins. Main Features of EventJot: -- Based on Twitter, quickly share photos and comments through your existing Twitter account -- Photo-centric communication means even with remote friends it's easy to share what's happening -- Everyone contributes means that events have more photos, more comments, more participation -- Press "Like" on the events and photos and share your favoritesSome common uses of EventJot: -- Night out on the town with friends -- Sporting events -- Music festivals -- much more!

reviews.title: cool app!
reviews.comment: I love this app. It\'s nice that I can create events in both Japanese and English. A simple easy way to share events.
reviews.author: A Google User
